entry.title: Welcome to Ghostish
entry.content:
Ghostish is Jekyll theme designed to ease migration from Ghost

Using the output from jekyll_ghost_importer and this theme, migrating to Jekyll should be a breeze.

Images courtesy of Unsplash.
entry.summary: Ghostish is Jekyll theme designed to ease migration from Ghost

entry.title: README
entry.content:
Ghostish is Jekyll theme designed to ease migration from Ghost. Using the output from jekyll_ghost_importer and this theme, migrating to Jekyll should be a breeze.

Uses /content/ instead of the Jekyll standard /assets/ for images. That way you can just copy across the folder from your Ghost installation and don’t need to edit all the Post’s Front Matter sections, as generated by jekyll_ghost_importer.

Theme preview
entry.summary: Ghostish is Jekyll theme designed to ease migration from Ghost. Using the output from jekyll_ghost_importer and this theme, migrating to Jekyll should be a breeze.
